Trade/Device Name(s): Pantex Salivary Direct Testosterone Enzyme Immunoassay (EIA) Kit
Specimen Container(s): Non-sterile plain polypropylene tube with screw cap (Pantex Sample Collection Device)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Pantex Salivary Direct Testosterone EIA Kit and Pantex Sample Collection Device for quantitative measurement of testosterone in human saliva.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of testosterone in human saliva collected with the Pantex Sample Collection Device, aiding diagnosis and treatment of male sex hormone disorders including hypogonadism, impotence in males, and hirsutism and virilization in females due to tumors, polycystic ovaries, and adrenogenital syndromes.
